description: This table contains information about special needs marked for implants in a surgical case.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IMPLANT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains special needs category choices that have been made about implants in the case record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
